Resolved_query: IF Product Group (MATKL) in ( L002, ZMGRP1, 202R ) THEN set Product Number (PRODUCT) to 'GENAI01'. ELSE IF Product Group (MATKL) in ( '01', 'L001', 'ZSUK1RM1') THEN set Product Number (PRODUCT) to 'GENAI02'. ELSE IF Product Group (MATKL) in ( 'CH001', '02') THEN set Product Number (PRODUCT) to 'GenAI03'. ELSE set Product Number (PRODUCT) to 'GenAINo'.
